Title: Carnage
Writer: Yasmina Reza (based on the play 'Le Dieu du Carnage' by), Michael Katims (translated by), Yasmina Reza (screenplay by), Roman Polanski (screenplay by)
Actors: Jodie Foster, Kate Winslet, Christoph Waltz, John C. Reilly
Plot: Two pairs of parents hold a cordial meeting after their sons are involved in a fight, though as their time together progresses, increasingly childish behavior throws the discussion into chaos.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Golden Globes. Another 7 wins & 18 nominations.
Production: Constantin Film, Canal+, SBS Productions, Wild Bunch
